Summary: I think it was,observing,testing new technology,sending or receicing ,info.I don't think the the last two.
divs: Sighting Details Facing southwest clear blue sky, not anything up there except a commercial airplane to my rihgt,no bigger than the end of pinky nail, at a distance.I was outside laening on my car.I was admiring my neighbors spuce across the street.So, i had a brand new comcorder i've been itching to use i went up to get .Took it off the charger and put in ,went down though the garage went out a few steps .Looked to see how far the plane went, not very far.My head going back to my subject ,but something cought my eye ,a black dot ,it's just a bird ,it's getting bigger ,a plane then coming at me,there was no shine .Sun to the left of tree and dot to right "USE YOUR CAMERA''pushed record ''wha'' nothing, not recording ,push play and record nada looked at plane,dot kept getting bigger and bigger .S.O.L. on vcr ,what else can I do, measure WITH what quarter,over left eye. Bring to face whatch dot large craft came out slowly very slowly.all episdes took exactly ,12,sec,to the letter craft out stayed 6 min , went back into the wormhole it didn't disapeare until last microsecond,parts. CONTACT ME IF WANT TO KNOW MORE ,IT WAS INARE ATMASPERE CALL ABOUT QUARTER
